title: Citi CFO says a credit card cap would have a 'deleterious' impact on the economy
full_text: Citi CFO says a credit card cap would have a 'deleterious' impact on the economy. Citi's CFO said the bank "would" and "could" not support the proposed cap.. Citi reported fourth-quarter earnings on Thursday.Mike Kemp/In Pictures via Getty Images <ul><li>Citi's CFO Mark Mason said Trump's proposed credit card cap would have a 'deleterious' impact on the … [+1398 chars]
